channel.title: Comments on: Cardinal Martini on Judaism and Jerusalem

item.title: By: Alan J. Weisbard
item.dc:creator: Alan J. Weisbard
item.description: Many thanks for sharing the name and words of Cardinal Martini with a wider audience. I only wish I had known of him earlier, and perhaps had the opportunity to meet and converse with him. It is unfortunate that the media tend to focus on strife and not on opportunities for mutual learning and growth between and among religious traditions.
